comments.body:
is there no way we can automatically generate the complete set here?

Also, it would be really nice if we could have the docs show the icons, like we do for Material icons.

I'll try to figure out some way to show the image in the doc. 

I think it'll be hard to automate the semantic description of the font though. But I'll probably put the mapping in the font package like the material font the next time I update the fonts and add some doc.
Glad to see more icons added :)
Everything below was automatically generated, no need to review
To reviewer(s), everything after line 1077 is automatically generated and does not require review
Picked up some regex skills to avoid doing this too manually!
